adverbs.description: tolerably (comparative more tolerably, superlative most tolerably)

entries.meaning: In a tolerable manner; to an extent that can be tolerated.
examples: I don't like the music, but it's tolerably quiet.
With a small knife or larding pin, cut holes in the beef, to receive the bacon thus prepared; place the lardings tolerably thick and even; rub the beef over with the remainder of the seasoning  […]
